title: Biden at the Bridge
sub_head: White House math on infrastructure funding foreshadows disappointing results.
body:
When it comes to motivational speaking, President Joe Biden is no Kirby Smart. But this week Mr. Biden is gamely trying to sell his latest 13-figure spending law at a series of events in various states.
The first stop on the tour was a New Hampshire bridge that crosses the Pemigewasset River in the Woodstock area. According to government officials the bridge has been in need of repair since at least the Obama-Biden administration, which like the current administration promised historic improvements to the nationâ€™s infrastructure.
